snippet: Frederik Van Lierde of Belgium won the Ironman World Championship on the Big Island of Hawaii, bursting into the lead with less than 10 miles to go.
abstract: Frederik Van Lierde of Belgium wins the Ironman World Championship on the Big Island of Hawaii, finishing 2.4-mile ocean swim, 112-mile bike ride and marathon run in 8 hours 12 minutes 29 seconds.
lead_paragraph: Frederik Van Lierde of Belgium won the Ironman World Championship on the Big Island of Hawaii, bursting into the lead with less than 10 miles to go.
